Introduction
This topic contains information on MOHP, including
definition of MOHP
amount of MOHP
relationship between MOHP and other benefits
dates of entitlement and payment
when to pay MOHP
processing an award ofÂ MOHP
retroactive lump-sum payment eligibility
amount of lump-sum benefits payable
calculating the retroactive lump-sum amount
reviewing cases for entitlement to lump-sum payment
, and
notification to a Veteran or service member of a retroactive lump-sum payment
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6 - Medal of Honor Pension (MOHP)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section None
